title: Greatswords
content:
read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Greatswords in BG3. These Weapon Actions are Pommel Strike, Lacerate, and Cleave.

Battleaxes Clubs Daggers Darts Flails Glaives Greataxes Greatclubs Greatswords Halberds Handaxes Hand Crossbows Heavy Crossbows Javelins Light Crossbows Light Hammers Longbows Longswords Maces Mauls Morningstars Pikes Quarterstaves Rapiers Scimitars Shortbows Shortswords Sickles Spears Tridents War Pic
